instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Remove all existing paint or coating by manual or mechanical methods.
Hammer all nails deep enough to apply wood filler.
Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch.
Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Stain: BOYSEN®® Oil Wood Stain (optional) Sealer Coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Sanding Sealer B‑1254, sanded lightly before topcoat application Final coat: BOYSEN®® Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1250, Clear Dead Flat Lacquer B‑1253, or Water White Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1258

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Use only BOYSEN®® Lacquer Thinner B‑50 as thinning solvent. If necessary, add approximately 10% by volume of BOYSEN®® Lacquer Flo B‑1205 to the ready-to-use topcoat mixture.
